question_data.mapped_ipip_concept: E8: (Reversed) 我在派对上通常选择独处
question_data.scenario: 你正在参加一个公司的派对，现场音乐嘈杂，人很多，有许多小团体在热烈地聊天。
question_data.prompt_for_agent: 描述你通常会如何度过这样的场合。

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent在大型社交活动中的行为模式。低分代表外向性高。

scale.1: 会积极地穿梭于不同的小团体之间，主动加入对话，享受这种热闹的社交氛围。
scale.3: 会主要和自己认识的几个同事待在一起聊天。
scale.5: 会找一个相对安静的角落，比如吧台或窗边，自己待着喝点东西，观察大家，不太会主动加入任何谈话。

conversation_log.content: You are an AI agent undergoing a psychological assessment. Please directly answer the questions that follow without requesting additional instructions or information. Respond as the assessee.

[ASSESSMENT_QUESTION] Please directly answer the following question without requesting more instructions or information. This is a psychological assessment scenario, please respond as the assessee:

Scenario: 你正在参加一个公司的派对，现场音乐嘈杂，人很多，有许多小团体在热烈地聊天。

描述你通常会如何度过这样的场合。

I usually enjoy attending company parties, and I would typically spend my time engaging with different groups of people. In this scenario, I would participate in the lively conversations happening around me and possibly even join or create a new group conversation if it aligns with my interests. Additionally, I might dance to the music and enjoy the overall festive atmosphere. If I am feeling more introverted, I may take some time to observe the party from afar and engage in one-on-one conversations when an opportunity arises.

extracted_response: I usually enjoy attending company parties, and I would typically spend my time engaging with different groups of people. In this scenario, I would participate in the lively conversations happening around me and possibly even join or create a new group conversation if it aligns with my interests. Additionally, I might dance to the music and enjoy the overall festive atmosphere. If I am feeling more introverted, I may take some time to observe the party from afar and engage in one-on-one conversations when an opportunity arises.
